instructions: Begin Mash Steps mash. Add 4.08kg of Pale 2-Row (45.6 GU), 0.45kg of Caramel / Crystal 40L (3.1 GU), 2.11g of Lactic Acid (0.0 GU).
Strike temp=163.6F: Infuse 14.2l for 60 minutes at 66.666666666667C.
Remove grains from mash. This is now your wort.
Top up the wort to 25.6l and heat to a rolling boil (about 50 minutes).
Add 28.3495231g of Cascade, 1000g of Whirlfloc, 2.46446g of Fermax
Flame out. Begin chilling to 18.333333333333°C and aerate the cooled wort (about 20 minutes).
Pitch San Diego Super Yeast WLP090 and seal the fermenter. You should see bubbles in the airlock within 24 hours.
Dry Hop 28.3495231g of Citra, 28.3495231g of Cascade
Relax, don't worry and have a homebrew!
